media:group.media:description:
ยซิฑีฏึ ีฝยป ีทีกีขีกีฉีกีฉีฅึีฉีซ ีฐีกีตีฅึีงีถ ีขีกีชีถีซ ีญีดีขีกีฃีซึ ิฒีกีฃึีกีฟ ิทีฝีคีธึีฃีฅีกีถ ยซ#ิถีกึีฏีฅึีกีฏยป-ีซ ีฐีกีฒีธึีคีกีพีกึ ิฑึีงีถ ีีฅึีฉีฅีทีฅีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึึีฅึ ีีธีฝีฏีธึีกีตีซ ีดีงีป ีตีธึีถีธึีกึ 14-ีซีถ ีดีฅีฏีถีกึีฏีกีฎ ีฐีกีต-ีฉีธึึึ ีฅึีฏีญึ ีฝีธึีฉีฅีกีถ ีดีกีฝีซีถึ ิฑีถ ีกีตีฝ ีกีผีซีฉีธีพ ีกีถีคึีกีคีกึีฑีกึ ีจีถีฉีกึีธีฒ ีขีกีถีกีฏึีธึีฉีซึีถีถีฅึีธึีถ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีฅีกีฌ ีฉึึีกีฏีกีถ ีดีกีดีธึีฌีซ ีกึีฑีกีฃีกีถึีซีถ, ินีธึึึีซีธีต ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีธึีฉีฅีกีถ ีดึ ีฟีฅึีดีกีถ, ีซีถีนีบีงีฝ ีถีกีฅึ ีบีธีฌีฝีกีฐีกีตีธึีฉีฅีกีถ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีธึีฉีฅีกีถึ

entry.title: โA nationโs culture is vital for its existence, and we must do everything to develop itโ

media:group.media:title: โA nationโs culture is vital for its existence, and we must do everything to develop itโ
media:group.media:description:
Simon Abkarian, in conversation with Lara Tcholakian, speaks about the latest project he has undertaken with Serge Avรฉdikian and several artists to share and exchange knowledge with local artists in Armenia. He reveals his concerns and the challenges that Armeniaโs art sector is facing.
Abkarian alsoreflects on the impact that his memories of the Armenian Genocide stories have had on him - from Musa Dagh, Cesaria, and Erzurum โ and explains how the those memories have helped him develop as an actor, director and writer. Finally, he shares his hope and vision for a more collective nation whereby Armenia and the Diaspora collaborate and work efficiently together.
About Simon Abkarian Simon Abkarian is an actor, director and writer. He was born in France, grew up in Lebanon, then later settled in France again. Simon has gained international success as an actor in both theatre and feature films. He rose to fame by joining Ariane Mnouchkineโs Thรฉatre du Soleil. In 2001, he starred in Kalinoskiโs Beast on the Moon which won him his first Moliรจre. He has been featured in more than 60 international films, including Sally Potterโs Yes, and the James Bond film, Casino Royale. He also appeared in Atom Egoyanโs Ararat as Arshile Gorky, in Robert Guediguianโs The Army of Crime as Missak Manouchian, and Robert Kechichianโs Aram, as Aram, to name a few. In 2020, Abkarian was awarded with 3 Moliรจre awards for his play โElectre des bas-fondsโ.
Program overview Armenian leaders share inherited cultural and historical narratives, memories, life learnings and experiences. Down-to-earth, authentic and mindful conversations preserve the stories and legacies of families, and reflect on the lessons learnt from inherited collective trauma and introspective leadership.

media:group.media:description:
Dr. David Blaschke is a professor of physics and vice director of the Institute of Theoretical Science at the University of Wroclaw in Poland.

๐ีีฅีฒีซ ีขีถีกีฏีซีนีจ ีฐีกีตีฟีถีพีฅีฌ ีง ีกีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีพีฅึีกีฐีฝีฏีธีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฟีกีฏ ีฃีฟีถีพีธีฒ ีฟีกึีกีฎึีธึีด, ีถึีก ีฐีฅีฟี 300 ีธีนีญีกึ ๐ิตึีฏึีกีทีกึีชี ิฟีกีบีกีถ ึีกีฒีกึีซึ 12 ีฏีด ีฐีฅีผีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีพึีก ๐ิฟีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีีตีธึีถีซึีซ ีฐีตีธึึีกีถีธึีถีฅึีซีถ 175 ีดีซีฌีซีธีถ ีคึีกีด ีง ีธึีฒีฒีฅีฌ ๐ิณีธึีซีฝ ีฐีกีดีกีตีถึีซ 2022-26ีฉีฉ. ีฐีถีฃีกีดีตีก ีฆีกึีฃีกึีดีกีถ ีฎึีกีฃึีซ ึีถีถีกึีฏีธึีดีถีฅึ ึ ีกีผีกีปีกึีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึ

media:group.media:description:
ีีธึีถีพีกึีซ 1-ีซึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีกึีฃีฅีฌีพีฅีฌ ีง ีดีซีถีนึ 50 ีดีซีฏึีธีถ ีฐีกีฝีฟีธึีฉีตีกีดีข ีบีธีฌีซีงีฉีซีฌีฅีถีกีตีซีถ ีฟีธีบึีกีฏีถีฅึีซ ีพีกีณีกีผึีถ ีธึ ีกีถีพีณีกึ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีธึีดีจึ ีึีฅีถึีซี ีธึีชีซ ีดีฅีป ีดีฟีถีฅีฌีธึึ ีทีธึึีป ึีฝีกีถ ึ ึ ีง ีกีถึีฅีฌ, ีฝีกีฏีกีตีถ, ึีกีฒีกึีกึีซีถีฅึีซ ีบีถีคีดีกีดีข, ีญีกีถีธึีฉีถีฅึีธึีด ีคีฅีผ ีถีธึีตีถ ีบีธีฌีซีงีฉีซีฌีฅีถีกีตีซีถ ีฟีธีบึีกีฏีถีฅึีถ ีฅีถ ีพีกีณีกีผีธึีดึ ีึีบีฅีฝ ีพีฅึีกีฐีฝีฏีธีฒ ีดีกึีดีซีถี ิตึึีกีถีซ ึีกีฒีกึีกีบีฅีฟีกึีกีถีจ ีดีซีกีตีถ ีฐีธึีถีพีกึีซ 20-ีซึ ีฝีฏีฝีฅึ ีพีฅึีกีฐีฝีฏีธีฒีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจี ีดีฅีฏีถีกีขีกีถีฅีฌีธีพ, ีธึ ยซีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีนีกีฏีกีถ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึีถีฅึ ีงีซีถ ีจีถีฉีกีถีธึีดยปึ
